string-array.name: sections_specific_notebook
string-array.item: GET: Get list of all sections under a specific notebook
First we get a list of all notebooks and then query for a list of all sections under the selected notebook. Please select a specific notebook from the drop-down above

string-array.name: sections_specific_name
string-array.item: GET: Get sections with a specific name

Query for a list of all sections with a given name. This example shows how to use the \'$filter=name eq \'<term>\' query parameter. Please enter the case-sensitive full section name to look for in the TextBox above

string-array.name: get_all_sections
string-array.item: GET: Get list of all sections
Queries for all sections under all notebooks in OneNote and returns a list

string-array.name: get_metadata_of_section
string-array.item: GET: Get metadata of a specific section
Following the previous example, first we get a list of all sections and then query for the selected section. Please select a specific section from the drop-down above

string-array.name: create_section
string-array.item: POST: Create a section in a notebook
First we get a list of all notebooks and then create an empty section in the selected notebook. Please select a notebook from the drop-down above and enter the new section\'s name in the text box.

string-array.name: create_section_in_sectiongroup
string-array.item: POST: Create a section in a section group

First we get a list of all section groups and then create an empty section group in the selected section group. Please select a section group from the drop-down above and enter the new section group\'s name in the text box.
